title: My Lobola Guide
summary: AI-powered cultural guide for African lobola traditions with Uncle Wisdom AI assistant. Features real-time AI guidance, cultural calculations, and multi-language support.

title: Scoutlify
summary: Gamified football scouting platform for South Africa with YouTube integration and dark theme.
